Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The class providing the controller of the application.

The controller connects the View with the Model.

saveUploadFileChooser is separated from exportFileChooser because:

  • They need different file filters options
  • This way the default file save name will be equal to the uploaded file name when the dialog shows up
Author:
WJW02

    • addActionListeners

      private void addActionListeners()
      Binds the components of the view to ActionListeners.

    • initFrame

      private void initFrame()
      Initializes View.getFrame() to show a confirmation dialog when trying to close without saving.

    • initAutomaticSaveTimer

      private void initAutomaticSaveTimer()
      Initializes automaticSaveTimer to Timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(TimerTask, long, long) automaticSaveTimerTask.

      automaticSaveTimerTask runs automaticSaveFile().

    • fillOperationalTextFields

      private void fillOperationalTextFields()
      Fills the text fields in the Table Operation section with the values of the selected row. If no row is selected the text fields get cleared.

    • initTable

      private void initTable()
      Initializes the table to fill in the text fields in the Table Operation section when selected and sets its selection mode to single.

    • automaticSaveFile

      private void automaticSaveFile()
      Makes a backup of Model.

    • manualSaveFile

      private void manualSaveFile()
      Shows the save dialog to save the Model in a .txt file.

    • uploadFile

      private void uploadFile()
      Shows the open dialog to upload a compatible .txt file in the Model.

    • exportFile

      private void exportFile()
      Shows a save dialog to export the Model in a file (csv, txt, ods).

    • printFile

      private void printFile()
      Shows a print dialog to print the Model.

    • updateValueAmountLabel

      private void updateValueAmountLabel()
      Updates View.getValueAmountLabel() to show the total amount.

    • createBudgetItem

      private BudgetItem createBudgetItem()
      Creates a BudgetItem from the values in View.getDateTextField(), View.getDescriptionTextField() and View.getAmountTextField().
      Returns:
      BudgetItem - if the text fields contain compatible data
      null - otherwise

    • addItem

      private void addItem()
      Adds the BudgetItem from the values in View.getDateTextField(), View.getDescriptionTextField() and View.getAmountTextField() in the Model.
      See Also:
      • createBudgetItem()

    • convertSelectedRowIndexToModel

      private int convertSelectedRowIndexToModel()
      Converts the index of the selected row in View.getTable() to its equivalent in Model.getTableModel().
      Returns:
      index - if true
      -1 - otherwise

    • deleteItem

      private void deleteItem()
      Deletes the selected item from Model.

    • updateItem

      private void updateItem()
      Updates the selected item with the values specified in View.getDateTextField(), View.getDescriptionTextField() and View.getAmountTextField().
      See Also:
      • createBudgetItem()

    • disableOtherComponents

      private void disableOtherComponents()
      Disables the components that lets the user to freely specify the date range.

    • selectDateFilter

      private void selectDateFilter()
      Selects the filter to apply on View.getTable() given the selected item on View.getDateComboBox().

      The option other allows to freely specify the date range by enabling the right components.

      See Also:
      • applyDate(LocalDate, LocalDate)
      • disableOtherComponents()

    • applyOther

      private void applyOther()
      Applies the date filter specified by View.getStartDateTextField() and View.getEndDateTextField() on View.getTable().
      See Also:
      • applyDate(LocalDate, LocalDate)

    • applyDate

      private void applyDate(LocalDate fromDate, LocalDate toDate)
      Applies the date filter on View.getTable().
      Parameters:
      fromDate - start date
      toDate - end date
      See Also:
      • RowFilter

    • clearFilter

      private void clearFilter()
      Clears the date filters applied on View.getTable().

    • search

      private void search()
      Highlights the first row that matches the string in View.getSearchBar().

    • clearSelection

      private void clearSelection()
      Clears the search and the selected row on View.getTable().
